content: I'll create a social media campaign to promote the event and encourage participants to share their experiences. I'll use a unique hashtag, create engaging content, and highlight sponsors and participants on social media. I'll also share fundraising tips, event updates, and live updates during the event. After the event, I'll share a recap, thank-you messages, and fundraising totals. I'll also consider partnering with influencers and ambassadors to promote the event and share their own experiences.
